articles.title: Goldman Sachs mandates vaccines; South Africa registers 10,346 new cases - Daily Maverick
articles.description: South Africa registered 10,346 new Covid-19 cases, bringing the cumulative total to 2,708,951. A further 369 Covid-19-related deaths were reported, taking total official deaths to 79,953. A total of 11,076,106 people have been vaccinated.
articles.content:
